price: Munahozeho iswala (z’itegeko) [8], munatange amaturo (Zakat y’itegeko)[9] kandi mwuname hamwe n’abunama (mukora iswala).
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرۡكَعُواْ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
footnotes: [1] Reba uko twasobanuye iyi nyito mu murongo wa 62 muri Surat ul Baqarat.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-ir'kaʿū maʿa al-rākiʿīna
